latex:
A sequence $ a_1, a_2, \ldots$ of non-negative integers is defined by the rule $ a_{n + 2} = |a_{n + 1} - a_n|$ for $ n\ge 1$.  If $ a_1 = 999, a_2 < 999,$ and $ a_{2006} = 1$, how many different values of $ a_2$ are possible?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A) } 165 \qquad \textbf{(B) } 324 \qquad \textbf{(C) } 495 \qquad \textbf{(D) } 499 \qquad \textbf{(E) } 660$
